<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/795</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/795</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Mapes de Catalunya</string>
            <string language="en">Maps of Catalonia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Karten von Katalonien</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cartes de la Catalogne</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mapas de Catalonia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Programmi della Catalogna</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χάρτες της Καταλωνίας</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recurs didàctic interactiu que permet representar i imprimir dades diverses (comarques, relleu, rius, ciutats, infraestructures de comunicació) sobre mapes de Catalunya, així com la creació de gràfics. Els mapes poden modificar la seva escala.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive resource that allows viewer to present and print different types of statistics (geographic, economic and demographic) on maps of Catalonia, and also to draw graphs. The map scale can be modified.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">aeroport</string>
            <string language="en">airport</string>
            <string language="es">aeropuerto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">geografia</string>
            <string language="en">geography</string>
            <string language="es">geografía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">medi geofísic</string>
            <string language="en">geophysical environment</string>
            <string language="es">medio geofísico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">port</string>
            <string language="en">port</string>
            <string language="es">puerto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ferrocarril</string>
            <string language="en">railway</string>
            <string language="es">ferrocarril</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">carreteres</string>
            <string language="en">roads</string>
            <string language="es">carreteras</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">infraestructura dels transports</string>
            <string language="en">transport facilities</string>
            <string language="es">infraestructura de los transportes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">curs d'aigua</string>
            <string language="en">watercourse</string>
            <string language="es">curso de agua</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktives Hilfsmittel, das Projektor erlaubt, 
unterschiedliche Typen der Statistiken (geographisch, ökonomisch und 
demographisch) auf Karten von Katalonien darzustellen und zu drucken 
und Diagramme auch zeichnen. Die Karte Skala kann geändert 
werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource interactive qui permet au visualisateur
de présenter et imprimer différents types de statistiques 
(géographique, économique et démographique) sur des cartes de la 
Catalogne, et tracer également des graphiques. L'échelle de 
carte peut être modifiée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso interativo que permite que o visor 
apresente e imprima tipos diferentes de statistics (geográfico, 
econômico e demográfico) em mapas de Catalonia, e para desenhar 
também gráficos. A escala do mapa pode ser modificada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa interattiva che permette che il visore 
presenti e stampi i tipi differenti di statistiche (geografico, 
economico e demografico) sui programmi della Catalogna ed anche 
tracciare i grafici. La scala del programma può essere 
modificata.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογικό στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς που επιτρέπει στην 
εμφάνιση για να παρουσιάσει και να τυπώσει τους διαφορετικούς 
τύπους στατιστικών (γεωγραφικός, οικονομικός και δημογραφικός) 
στους χάρτες της Καταλωνίας, και επίσης για να σύρει τις γραφικές
παραστάσεις. Η κλίμακα χαρτών μπορεί να τροποποιηθεί.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Flughafen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geographie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
